title: Polygon 2.0 Aims to Provide 'Unified Liquidity' Across Ethereum Scaling Networks
description: The company said Polygon 2.0 will better connect separate blockchains and do away with wrapped tokens.

title: Solana NFT protocol Cardinal to halt operations in August
description:
Solana-based (SOL)protocol Cardinal, which pioneered “conditional ownership” in NFTs, has announced that it would end operations effective August 26. The team cited the “incredibly difficult macroeconomic environment” as its reason, according to a June 28 Twitter thread. “We’ve done our best to navigate this incredibly difficult macroeconomic environment since we began building 18 months ago, […]

The post Solana NFT protocol Cardinal to halt operations in August appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: What the revised GDP numbers tell us about the U.S. economy
description: Withstanding the test of elevated interest rates, the U.S. economy demonstrated its mettle, registering a 2% annual growth rate from January through March. This growth narrative, supported by the most vigorous consumer spending witnessed in nearly two years, contributes a new chapter to the American economic story. Decoding the upgraded growth estimate of U.S. economy ... Read more

title: Bank of America’s jaw-dropping $100b bond market blunder
description: In the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic, U.S. banking giant Bank of America (BofA) finds itself reeling from a staggering $100bn bond market blunder, reflecting the risks taken during unprecedented times. The decision to invest a majority of the $670bn pandemic-era deposit inflow into bonds at a time of low yields and inflated prices has ... Read more

title: Bank of Italy advocates new regulations following crypto winter fallout
description: Italy's leading banking authority has emphasized the need for a strong and risk-based regulatory framework surrounding stablecoins.

title: Lightspark CEO says US lags UK in digital asset development
description: Lightspark CEO David Marcus recently expressed concerns about the United States falling behind in digital asset development, further intensifying discussions on global cryptocurrency competitiveness.

title: Tether Partners with Georgia to Create Bullish Bitcoin P2P Infrastructure – Will It Drive BTC Price to New ATH?
description: In a recent announcement, Tether reveals that it is partnering with Georgia to develop blockchain and advance its adoption in the country.  The partnership seeks to fully help local tech startups lean into the peer-to-peer and blockchain industry.  Tether, the firm behind the blockchain-enabled platform Tether.io, which powers the popular USDT stablecoin, has partnered with [...]

title: Pepe Coin (PEPE) Trading Volume Flies Past Dogecoin (DOGE) & Shiba Inu (SHIB). Will Alex The Doge (ALEX) fly past Pepe (PEPE) coin
description: In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrencies, the arena of meme coins has become an exciting battleground. Recently, Pepe Coin (PEPE) saw its trading volume soar past that of its rivals, Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB). title: Bruce Lee’s First Metaverse Debut Goes to Byte City
description:
June 29, 2023 – Singapore, Singapore The next-generation social gaming platform for digital collectibles backed by Cordell Broadus, Snoop Dogg’s son. Byte City, the next-generation social entertainment platform for digital collectibles is set to honor martial arts legend Bruce Lee in the digital universe. Blending digital collectibles and social interaction in a casual party gaming environment, […]

The post Bruce Lee’s First Metaverse Debut Goes to Byte City appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
